text: [Music]
well we're actually retooling the whole
site it's a little bit like uh when you
want to rebuild the kitchen you have to
sort of demolish it first so we've been
in that process and it'll be relaunching
in January and part of the reason is
that there have been a lot of
developments online that we want to
capitalize on and that's involved the
necessity building a new infrastructure
so the new site will have much more
opportunity for social networking much
more opportunities for targeting and
personalization it'll have widgets so
people can Port their content to other
sites I think the days of kind of the
Walled Garden approach are are really in
the past and it'll just have a much more
expansive opportunity for Content
including a lot of video content which
we know from our own experience online
with our consumers is a growing interest
as more and more people have high-speed
Broadband
access
